languages.text: "Ты защищаешь Глейто и в этом черпаешь силы. Может, однажды ты захочешь хранить и людские жизни".
"You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."
languages.original_text: "Ты защищаешь Глейто и в этом черпаешь силы. Может, однажды ты захочешь хранить и людские жизни".

traits.locale_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."
"You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."
"You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."
"You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."
"You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

languages.text: 「君はグライトを守り、そのことから力を得ている。いつかきっと、人間の命を守りたいと思う日が来るかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: 「君はグライトを守り、そのことから力を得ている。いつかきっと、人間の命を守りたいと思う日が来るかもしれない」

languages.text: "Ihr beschützt Glaito und zieht daraus Stärke. Vielleicht wollt Ihr eines Tages auch Menschenleben beschützen."
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr beschützt Glaito und zieht daraus Stärke. Vielleicht wollt Ihr eines Tages auch Menschenleben beschützen."

languages.text: « Vous protégez Glaito, et c'est de là que vous vient votre force. Peut-être qu'un jour, vous aurez également envie de protéger des humains. »
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: « Vous protégez Glaito, et c'est de là que vous vient votre force. Peut-être qu'un jour, vous aurez également envie de protéger des humains. »

languages.text: «Usted protege a Glaito, y eso le da fuerzas. Tal vez algún día sienta la misma necesidad de proteger vidas humanas».
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: «Usted protege a Glaito, y eso le da fuerzas. Tal vez algún día sienta la misma necesidad de proteger vidas humanas».

languages.text: “你守护着格雷托，从中汲取着力量。或许某一天，你也同样会想要守护人类的性命。”
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: “你守护着格雷托，从中汲取着力量。或许某一天，你也同样会想要守护人类的性命。”

languages.text: "Glaito'yu koruyor, bundan güç buluyorsun. Belki bir gün insan hayatlarını da korumak istersin."
languages.original_text: "You protect Glaito, and you draw strength from that. Perhaps one day you will want to protect human lives, too."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito'yu koruyor, bundan güç buluyorsun. Belki bir gün insan hayatlarını da korumak istersin."
